perk.name: Robin Hood
perk.description_key: Increases damage with each rank, using a Bow.

perk.name: Legolas
perk.description_key: Increases chance to dismember or decapitate a zombie with each rank, using a Bow.

perk.name: Advanced Forge
perk.description_key: The Advanced Forge is used to make more recipes than a regular forge

perk.name: Weapon Station
perk.description_key: This workstation allows you to combine items to make better ones and craft gun and tool parts

perk.name: Tailor Station
perk.description_key: The Tailoring Station is where you can craft all cloth and leather based clothing and allows you to cure animal hide

perk.name: Blacksmithing Station
perk.description_key: The Blacksmithing Station allows you to make metal armor and items using a Blacksmith Hammer and Welding Torch. You can purchase the Hammer and Anvil before you can purchase the Station and craft it in the forge

perk.name: Fermenting Station
perk.description_key: The Fermenting Station allows you to make fertilizer, grain alcohol and beer as well as other various items

perk.name: Oil Refinery
perk.description_key: The oil refinery is used to make gas, oil and all forms of fuel

perk.name: Water Well
perk.description_key: A water well can be used to keep your stock of water replenished

perk.name: Decoration Station
perk.description_key: A decoration station is where you can find all the new decorative items as well as some of the older ones

perk.name: Elevators
perk.description_key: Learn to make Basic and Working Elevators buy purchasing this perk

perk.name: 556mm Round Crafting
perk.description_key: Learn to craft 556mm rounds at a workbench

perk.name: 32mm Round Crafting
perk.description_key: Learn to craft 32mm rounds at a workbench

perk.name: Windmill Energy
perk.description_key: This perk will unlock the recipe for wind energy

perk.name: Green Thumb
perk.description_key: Learn how to break down grown plants into seeds. Breaking down seeds requires a Mortar and Pestle.

perk.name: Plumbing
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft plumbing kits to repair sinks for a clean source of drinking water.

perk.name: Oven Repair
perk.description_key: Max out this perk to learn how to craft Oven Repair kits to repair ovens for cooking without needing fuel.

perk.name: Tool Head Crafting
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft tool and weapon heads that you use to assemble tools and weapons in the workbench

crafting_skill.name: Cooking
crafting_skill.description_key: The higher your skill in cooking the faster you can craft meals.

perk.name: Advanced Cooking
perk.description_key: Learn new recipes from buying this perk.

perk.name: HandgunPartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft handgun parts

perk.name: RiflePartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft rifle parts

perk.name: ShotgunPartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft shotgun parts

perk.name: MiscPartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft various tool parts

perk.name: BowPartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft compound bow parts

perk.name: RocketLauncherPartsPerk
perk.description_key: Unlock the ability to craft rocket launcher parts

perk.name: Traps
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft improvised traps.

perk.name: Arrow Crafting
perk.description_key: Learn to craft Iron and Steel Arrows and Bolts

perk.name: Explosive Rockets
perk.description_key: Learn how to assemble a rocket launcher and craft awesome rockets !

perk.name: Explosive Bombs
perk.description_key: Learn how to craft dynamite (for crackin safes), tnt (for demolition) and true mining tnt (for mining without loosing ressources) !

perk.name: RiflesClass
perk.description_key: You will receive 150 homemade 762 ammo a hunting rifle the knowledge to assemble a hunting rifle and access to assemble an M25 Sniper

perk.name: Rifle Exclusive
perk.description_key: The rifle expert gains access to the exclusive M25 Sniper

perk.name: HandgunsClass
perk.description_key: You will receive 200 homemade pistol ammo a pistol the knowledge to assemble a pistol and access to assemble a Desert Eagle

perk.name: Handgun Exclusive
perk.description_key: The handgun expert gains access to the exclusive Desert Eagle

perk.name: ShotgunsClass
perk.description_key: You will receive 100 homemade shotgun shells a pump shotgun the knowledge to assemble a pump shotgun and access to assemble a Double Barrel Shotgun

perk.name: Shotgun Exclusive
perk.description_key: The shotgun expert gains access to the exclusive Double Barrel Shotgun

perk.name: SurvivorClass
perk.description_key: With this skill you will receive the knowledge to craft jars and pots and grills and some extra survival items

perk.name: Survival Skills
perk.description_key: The survivor excels at cooking and nourishment and can have access to makeshift survival equipment

perk.name: Self Sufficient
perk.description_key: Now that you live in this horrible world you better learn how to feed and water yourself too

perk.name: BladesClass
perk.description_key: With this skill you will receive a hunting knife 20 forged iron and a hunting knife schematic

perk.name: Blades Exclusive
perk.description_key: The blade weapons expert gains access to the exclusive Katana

perk.name: BowsClass
perk.description_key: With this skill you will receive a crossbow 250 stone crossbow bolts and a crossbow schematic

perk.name: Bow Exclusive
perk.description_key: The bow expert gains access to the exclusive Repeating Crossbow

perk.name: BluntClass
perk.description_key: With this skill you will receive a spiked club 20 forged iron and a spiked club schematic

perk.name: Blunt Exclusive
perk.description_key: The blunt weapon expert gains access to the exclusive Lucille Baseball Bat

perk.name: Homemade Rifle Bullet
perk.description_key: This home made bullet can be easily crafted and used in the gun class you have chosen

perk.name: Homemade Handgun Bullet
perk.description_key: This home made bullet can be easily crafted and used in the gun class you have chosen

perk.name: Homemade Shotgun Bullet
perk.description_key: This home made bullet can be easily crafted and used in the gun class you have chosen

perk.name: Stone Crossbow Bolt
perk.description_key: Stone crossbow bolts are crude and cheap but not as accurate

perk.name: MedicalClass
perk.description_key: With this class you will receive extra healing items and access to several exclusive health recipes such as antibiotics, first aid kits and advanced medicine

perk.name: Medical Skills
perk.description_key: The medic excels at creating health items

perk.name: FarmerClass
perk.description_key: With this class you will receive some seeds and access to a Composter

perk.name: Farming Skills
perk.description_key: The farmer excels at planting and maintaining a garden

perk.name: AmmoClass
perk.description_key: With this skill you will receive the knowledge to craft ammo for guns

action_skill.name: Electric Tools
action_skill.description_key: You can swing that electric tool like a boss. Increase this by using electric tools
